result.purpose: Automates the synchronization of documentation based on GitHub events (push and release).
result.architecture: The folder contains scripts that automate tasks related to GitHub events, following a procedural architecture pattern.

.github/scripts/sync_docs.sh.purpose: Automates the synchronization of documentation based on GitHub events (push and release).
side_effects: Modifies git configuration for user email and name.
Pushes changes to the remote repository.
risks: Potential exposure of sensitive information in the repository URL.
Risk of overwriting existing documentation if not handled properly.
